title: Daniel Knight: Can solar energy help save Greece? [Video]
itunes:author: Dr Daniel Knight
description: Contributor(s): Dr Daniel Knight | Solar energy could lower both crippling domestic energy costs in Greece and also provide the debt-ridden country with a valuable export commodity, according to Dr Daniel Knight, a postdoctoral research fellow from LSE’s European Institute.
